items.question: What services do you offer?
items.answer: I specialize in web development, focusing on creating responsive, user-friendly websites and web applications using modern technologies like React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS.

items.question: How long does a typical project take?
items.answer: Project timelines vary depending on complexity and scope. A simple website might take 2-4 weeks, while more complex applications can take several months. I'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

items.question: Do you offer maintenance after the project is complete?
items.answer: Yes, I offer ongoing maintenance and support packages to ensure your website remains up-to-date and secure. We can discuss these options based on your specific needs.

items.question: What is your design process?
items.answer: My design process begins with understanding your requirements, followed by wireframing, prototyping, and iterative design. I emphasize user experience and ensure designs are both aesthetically pleasing and functional.

items.question: Can you work with existing designs or brand guidelines?
items.answer: I'm experienced in implementing existing designs and adhering to established brand guidelines to ensure consistency across your digital presence.
